sentences.en: An insurance certificate has the same effect as an insurance policy.
sentences.cn: 保险凭证与保险单具有同样的效力.

sentences.en: birth/death/marriage certificate (=giving details of someone’s birth, death, or marriage)
Diploma and certificate courses do not normally require the submission of a dissertation.
sentences.cn: 为获得文凭和证书所修的课程通常不需要提交论文。

sentences.en: He was afforded a certificate upon completion of his course of study.
I have brought his birth certificate.
May I see your passport and health certificate, please ?
sentences.cn: 我可以看看你的护照和健康证 吗 ?

sentences.en: Nervously she approached the lady at the desk, holding her certificate and testimonials very tight.
sentences.cn: 她胆怯地走到坐在桌边的女士面前, 手里紧紧握着毕业证和鉴定书.

sentences.en: No one had seen her marriage certificate.
sentences.cn: 没人看到过她的结婚证书.

sentences.en: On the wall of the parlor was splashed his certificate of merit.
sentences.cn: 在客厅的墙上高悬着他的奖状.

sentences.en: Please submit an original salary description certificate issued by the employer.
sentences.cn: 请提供单位开据的原始明细工资单(书).

sentences.en: She proudly displayed her degree certificate to her parents.
sentences.cn: 她自豪地向父母展示了学位证书.

sentences.en: She was awarded a certificate of merit for her piano - playing.
sentences.cn: 她获钢琴演奏优秀奖状.

sentences.en: The certificate will have to be lodged at the registry.
sentences.cn: 证书必须存放在登记处.

sentences.en: To obtain a passport, you have to send in your birth certificate with the form.
sentences.cn: 要取得护照, 你得把出生证和表格一起呈上.

sentences.en: Upon approval, the Ministry of Foreign Economic Relations and Trade shall issue a certificate of approval.
sentences.cn: 批准后, 由对外经济贸易部发给批准证书.

sentences.en: Wives will have to bring along their marriage certificate.
sentences.cn: 已婚妇女必须携带结婚证。

words.tran_cn: 可证明的；可确认的；可保证的
具有证明文件的；立有证据的；业经证明的
被证明的；有保证的；具有证明文件的
证明，证实；颁发合格证书（certify的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 凭证管理中心；认证授权
品质证明书，质量证明书
品质证明书；技师证明书
登记证；注册证书；注册证明
试验证瞄；汽车（安全性能）证明

trans.tran_en: an official document that states that a fact or facts are true
